snippet.title: Iron Danger - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Iron Danger will release on March 25, 2020!
Get a glimpse of the game's time manipulation combat in this trailer.

Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/899310/Iron_Danger/

-- About The Game --

Iron Danger is a tactical RPG with a unique time manipulation mechanic. A never before seen combination that fuses the tactical depth of turn-based games with the exciting action of real-time games.

https://irondanger.com/
https://twitter.com/irondangerworld
https://www.facebook.com/irondangerworld/

-- Action Squad Studios --

https://actionsquadstudios.com/
https://twitter.com/Action_Squad
https://www.facebook.com/actionsquadstudios/

-- Follow us on Social Media --
